articles.title: Physical modeling for pure data (PMPD) and real-time interaction with an audio synthesis

title: tPlane3D
description: The `tPlane3D` object simulates interactions involving a 3D plane. It defines a plane in 3D space using an orientation vector and a point, and can specify a maximum interaction depth. This object is designed to interact with `mass` objects, likely for collision detection or other physical simulations.
